title: Report Dorm Noise Complaint
description: A student calls to make a noise complaint about a loud party in another room on their floor during quiet hours.

tasks.description: Identify the student making the complaint and the location of the noise.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary details while maintaining the caller's anonymity.

tasks.description: Contact the RA on duty for the building to investigate the complaint.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reaches the RA and relays the information.

tasks.description: Log the complaint in the residential life incident tracking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal record of the complaint.
